name: Support Request
subject: Help with account setup
body: Hi, I need help setting up my account. I'm having trouble with the login process.

name: API Integration Question
subject: API rate limits question
body: What are the current rate limits for the API? I'm building an integration and need to know the constraints.

name: Important Document
subject: Contract Amendment - Please Archive
body: Please find attached the contract amendment that needs to be archived for future reference.

name: System Alert
subject: Server CPU usage alert
body: CPU usage on server-01 has exceeded 80% for the last 5 minutes.

name: Sales Inquiry
subject: Enterprise pricing inquiry
body: We're interested in your enterprise plan for our team of 500+ users. Can you provide pricing information?

name: Newsletter Signup
subject: Newsletter subscription confirmation
body: Please confirm my subscription to your weekly newsletter.
